recipes.title: Steam/Boiled White Rice
recipes.name: rice
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
In a skillet, cook the pancetta or guanciale until crispy. Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and a pinch of black pepper.
Add drained spaghetti to the skillet with the pancetta. Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped parsley and extra Parmesan cheese.
